attributes.action: Stop The Proposed March By Extremist's Through Wooton Basset.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: lots of people have expressed their disgust at the proposed march through wooton basset by this outrageous group of islamic extremists.the prime minister himself has expressed his disgust at this so now the people should have their say.

rejection.details: The march is no longer going ahead.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
